register.description: The first TR submission word Offset = 00280000h + (j * 100h); where j = 0h to 1Fh

bitfield.description: Lines in a transfer
Bytes in a transfer
Flags for the operation and type of descriptor

register.description: The second TR submission word Offset = 00280008h + (j * 100h); where j = 0h to 1Fh

bitfield.description: Source transfer address virtual or physical allowed

register.description: The third TR submission word Offset = 00280010h + (j * 100h); where j = 0h to 1Fh

bitfield.description: The size of the 4th loop in the TR transfer
The size of the 3rd loop in the TR transfer
The first dimension width of the source data

register.description: The fourth TR submission word Offset = 00280018h + (j * 100h); where j = 0h to 1Fh

bitfield.description: The third dimension width of the source data
The second dimension width of the source data

register.description: The fifth TR submission word Offset = 00280020h + (j * 100h); where j = 0h to 1Fh

bitfield.description: The first dimension width of the destination data
The data formatting flags to be used for the TR

register.description: The sixth TR submission word Offset = 00280028h + (j * 100h); where j = 0h to 1Fh

bitfield.description: Destination transfer address virtual or physical allowed

register.description: The seventh TR submission word Offset = 00280030h + (j * 100h); where j = 0h to 1Fh

bitfield.description: The third dimension width of the destination data
The second dimension width of the destination data

register.description: The eight TR submission word Offset = 00280038h + (j * 100h); where j = 0h to 1Fh

bitfield.description: The fourth count of the destination if different than the source
The third count of the destination if different than the source
The second innermost count of the destination if different than the source
The innermost count of the destination if different than the source

register.description: The first TR submission word Offset = 00280040h + (j * 100h) + (k * 40h); where j = 0h to 1Fh, k = 0h to 2h
